edge: Columbia Pictures distributed the film Grown Ups 2.
Happy Madison Productions produced the film Grown Ups 2 along with Adam Sandler and Jack Giarraputo.
Adam Sandler collaborated with his longtime friend and director Dennis Dugan in the making of Grown Ups 2.
The movie Grown Ups 2 was filmed in Swampscott, Massachusetts.
The fictional town of Stanton, Connecticut, was portrayed during the filming of Grown Ups 2 in Swampscott, Massachusetts.
WWE Hall of Famer Steve Austin appeared in Grown Ups 2.
Sportscaster Michael Kay appeared in Grown Ups 2.
Basketball player Shaquille O'Neal appeared as a cop in Grown Ups 2.
